compounddef.title: Important Steps to be performed post cloning

listitem.para: Post cloning the repo, run the script init-repo.sh to enable pre-commit check on your local repo . Else you will be restricted during push and need to amend all the commits to match the pre-receive check.

For gradle build setup, need to create credentials using below commands -
Go to Component home - cd ${Component_home}/modules
To add credentials - gradle -b build.gradle_make_credentials addCredentials key password value $password
To remove credentials - gradle -b build.gradle_make_credentials removeCredentials key password
